text: (iddatâ€Œna avadhiyalli) sadhyavadastu mattige a mahileyarannu nivu vasisuvalle vasagolisiri mattu avara badukannu dustaragolisalikkagi avarige kirukula nidabedi. Ondu vele avaru garbhiniyaragiddare avaru prasavisuva tanaka avara kharcu veccagalannu bharisiri. Avaru nimagagi (maguvige) molehalunisidare â€“ avarige avara sambhavaneyannu nidiri. Nivu (ella visayagalannu) niyamanusara paraspara samalocisi nirdharisiri. Innu, nimage kastavenisidare, adakke (maguvige) berobbalu mole halunisali
